title: Miss Marple Series
brief_description: A series of films adapted from Agatha Christie’s books featuring Miss Marple, a sweet little old lady who lives in the village of St. Mary Mead and happens to be one of England’s greatest detectives! Each story, as well as being a murder mystery, also depicts English village life between the wars. Stars Joan Hickson as Miss Marple.
